title: Remove the Coloring page feature completely

requirements.text: Remove the Coloring page route from the app router so `/coloring` is no longer a valid page, including removing the `ColoringPage` import, the `coloringRoute` definition, and the `coloringRoute` entry in the `routeTree` in `frontend/src/App.tsx`.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer defines a route with `path: '/coloring'`.
The app builds successfully with no unused-import or missing-module errors related to `ColoringPage`.

requirements.text: Remove the Coloring link from the site navigation so users cannot navigate to `/coloring` from either desktop or mobile menus by deleting the `/coloring` entry from `navLinks` in `frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx`.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx` has no nav link with `href: '/coloring'` and no label `Coloring`.
Desktop navigation no longer displays a “Coloring” button.
Mobile navigation sheet no longer displays a “Coloring” button.

requirements.text: Delete the Coloring page implementation file `frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx` and ensure no remaining frontend code imports or references it.
acceptanceCriteria: No TypeScript compile errors occur due to references to `ColoringPage`.
A project-wide search shows no remaining imports of `./pages/ColoringPage` and no remaining references to `ColoringPage`.

requirements.text: Remove Coloring-related static assets from the frontend project (delete the uploaded Coloring PNG and any associated Coloring PDF/assets) so no Coloring assets remain in the shipped frontend static files.
acceptanceCriteria: `/assets/coloring/icoloring-9sd9.png` is removed from the frontend static assets.
Any Coloring-related PDF/static assets previously added for Coloring are removed from the frontend static assets.
A project-wide search shows no remaining references to `/assets/coloring/` or `icoloring-9sd9.png`.

requirements.text: Remove any remaining Coloring-related user-facing text, links, or references anywhere else in the frontend so there are no entry points or mentions of a Coloring feature in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: A project-wide search for "Coloring" and "/coloring" finds no remaining user-facing labels/links/routes related to the removed feature.
No page displays headings, helper text, or calls-to-action related to Coloring after the change.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify immutable frontend hook entrypoints listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (`frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
No backend changes are required for removing the Coloring page; keep the single-actor Motoko backend unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not replace the removed Coloring page with a different page or new feature.
Do not add redirects, analytics, or tracking for `/coloring` unless explicitly requested.
Do not change unrelated navigation structure, theming, or layout beyond removing Coloring entries.
